entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Quaqtaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -13.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quaqtaq Airport 3:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -13.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -16.4°C
Wind: NW 33 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Blizzard developing near midnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Blizzard changing to periods of light snow near midnight and ending before morning then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
